items.sentence: Do you think anyone else in your office will get married this year?

If I'd known you were sick, I could've visited you in the hospital.
I use French a lot for my job, but I still prefer speaking English.
I suspect Tom and Mary aren't planning on going to Boston with you.

I'm sorry I haven't been able to give you my cousin's contact info.
Three boys came in. I spoke to the boy who seemed to be the oldest.
A man's happiness doesn't depend on what he has, but on what he is.
